user_query: I am planning a family vacation to Hawaii and I want to ensure we have all the necessary vaccinations. Can you provide me with a list of recommended vaccinations for travelers to Hawaii? Additionally, I would like to know the nutritional information for a recipe I found online. Please analyze the ingredients and provide me with the nutritional data.

TaskList.description: Gather information on recommended vaccinations for travelers to Hawaii.
Analyze the ingredients of the recipe to extract nutritional information.
